scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run build:noCompile
scripts.build:dev: del /q asarBuild && copyfiles index.js asarBuild/ && copyfiles LICENSE asarBuild/ && copyfiles package.json asarBuild/ && copyfiles icon.ico asarBuild/ && copyfiles alert.ico asarBuild/ && asar pack asarBuild dist/app.asar
scripts.build:noCompile: del /q asarBuild && copyfiles compiled.js asarBuild/ && copyfiles LICENSE asarBuild/ copyfiles package.json asarBuild/ && copyfiles icon.ico asarBuild/ && copyfiles alert.ico asarBuild/ && asar pack asarBuild dist/app.asar
